our article was published in the journal [Interactive Learning Environments](https://www.tandfonline.com/journals/nile20?utm_medium=affiliate&utm_campaign=S7721946419_EMENAC_NILE&utm_source=researchgate.net)

*Interactive Learning Environments* is a well-regarded international peer-reviewed journal focused on educational technology and learning sciences. It is published by Taylor & Francis and covers a broad spectrum of topics such as interactive learning systems, online education, virtual classrooms, and instructional design.
